backlink.description: Gets a list of pages which link to a page

block.description: Blocks a user from the wiki

delete.description: Deletes a page from the wiki

setconfig.description: Sets a value in config.json and reloads

categorize.description: Adds a category to each page on the wiki
categorize.info: Each page goes on it's own line

protect.description: Protects a page on the wiki
protect.info:
Move protection will be the same as edit protection unless it is specified 
Common protection values are `all`, `autoconfirmed`, and `sysop`
